messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 247
messages.msgSnippet: Wonder why so many folks think it is necessary to hurt childrens feelings like that? As if to toughen up is good for children. ?? Sharon of the Swamp ...
messages.messageBody:
Wonder why so many folks think it is necessary to hurt
childrens' feelings like that? As if to toughen up is
good for children. ??

Sharon of the Swamp


--- starsuncloud@... wrote:
> Sharon,
> I have a beef tongue (ack,gross, gag!!) memory for
> ya....
> My Grandparents had a farm, including beef cattle.
> Guess who the lucky kid
> was that got to haul in the "parts" after a cow was
> butchered one summer?
> That's right. ME!!
> Yucko. I remember staring at that
> not-so-pink-anymore tongue and wondering
> why on earth anyone would want to EAT it!
> Ren, no wonder I'm mostly vegetarian
>

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 247
messages.msgSnippet: Sharon, I have a beef tongue (ack,gross, gag!!) memory for ya.... My Grandparents had a farm, including beef cattle. Guess who the lucky kid was that got to
messages.messageBody:
Sharon,
I have a beef tongue (ack,gross, gag!!) memory for ya....
My Grandparents had a farm, including beef cattle. Guess who the lucky kid
was that got to haul in the "parts" after a cow was butchered one summer?
That's right. ME!!
Yucko. I remember staring at that not-so-pink-anymore tongue and wondering
why on earth anyone would want to EAT it!
Ren, no wonder I'm mostly vegetarian
